d1_flags: 1. goto C8A023 if MAGIC_CAKE_LADY_AT_BEACH is set
1. goto C9992F if POO_JOINS is set
d1_text:
Npc0999:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG MAGIC_CAKE_LADY_AT_BEACH L_C8A023]
ï¿½You know, I really want to eat some Magic cake.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's a mysterious work of art...[PAUSE 15]  I can't get that cake off my mind.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There's only one woman who can make Magic cake...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½She's hanging out in this club.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Yeah, she's over there at the entrance...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Anyway, the absolute irony and study of self-identification is...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Blah, blah, blah...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I don't know what to do![HALT][GOTO_IF_FLAG POO_JOINS L_C9992F]
[SET_FLAG MAGIC_CAKE_LADY_IDENTIFIED]
[END]
